Name: Phantom: Zip Zap
Desc: A type of ironclad electromagnetic Murmurin TD that attracts metal to form a protective shell around itself. Electric arcs are faintly visible through cracks in its metallic armor.
DescOpen:
This enemy has a <color=HighlightB>higher RES</color> to <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

Zip Zap is a type of ironclad electromagnetic Murmurin TD that attracts metal to form a protective shell around itself. Electric arcs are faintly visible through cracks in its metallic armor.

They may attach themselves to other Clamorling Tacet Discords to provide power amplification. When spent, Zip Zaps reverse the flow of their electricity to recharge themselves.

People in Lahai-Roi often catch Zip Zaps in the wild as an emergency power source.
